description: This Dart source file defines the TransactionService class, providing an interface to manage transactions via REST API calls. It includes methods for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting transactions, and interacts with an AuthService for authentication headers.

classes.name: TransactionService
classes.description: A service class providing static methods to interact with transaction data through a backend REST API.

methods.name: fetchTransactions
methods.description: Fetches all transactions for the authenticated user from the backend API.

methods.name: createTransaction
methods.description: Creates a new transaction with provided data, handling category resolution and data formatting.

methods.name: updateTransaction
methods.description: Updates an existing transaction identified by its ID with new data.

methods.name: deleteTransaction
methods.description: Deletes a transaction by its ID.
